A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I walked in to the theatre expecting to see star wars. I left with an odd amount of slapstick comedy\, 2 1/2 hours but still no character progression\, and effects that mirror a children's super hero movie. As I walked out of the theatre I overheard a woman say \"well that was unnecessary\". About sums it up. Big fat rotten tomato this one.
